name: Pixel Adventure (itch) (Sujel)
description:
• Hello my nickname is Sujel and I have been making video games for 5 years.
  • It's my second video game, it doesn't have a goal yet but it won't be long...
  • I titled it "Pixel Adventure".
  • Explore the map, trade with NPCs, collect coins and fight monsters...
  1. To launch the game you must download the version that interests you (I advise you the most recent).
  2.  Once the download is complete, open the folder and double click on "PixelAdventure.exe".
  3. The game opens and you no longer have to play it!
